segments.text: What do you mean ? If he was a good programmer , he should have been raking it in .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The boss wanted to pay Bob with stock options . But Bob didn't want to play that game again .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: At his last start-up , Bob worked for stock and no salary . They folded and he made zip .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Now he only works freelance . Hundred bucks an hour .
segments.speaker: S2
